name: Treasure Hunter: Dungeon Siege
description:
In Treasure Hunter: Dungeon Siege, you play as a fearless treasure hunter who travels through various locations in search of hidden treasures. Your task is to protect the hero from waves of attacking monsters.

Treasure Hunter is an action-packed arcade game 🕹 where you must fight hordes of monsters, collect treasures, and upgrade your character's abilities. Experience amazing adventures, uncover the secrets of the dungeons, and collect treasures! Defeat all the enemies that prevent you from obtaining the treasure. You will face many dangers, such as mummies, zombies 🧟, skeletons 💀, vampires 🧛, ogres and more!

Incredible features:
🪙 100 different levels providing hours of entertainment
🪙 more than 30 types of enemies 👹
🪙 over 20 unique characters to choose from
🪙 compete with players from around the world 🌐
🪙 ability to earn and upgrade your character's abilities
🪙 classic arcade-style gameplay
🪙 stunning animations and high-resolution graphics in the game

🪙 the game is perfect for the whole family. The adventure with Treasure Hunter is great fun for both kids and adults 👪

Join the Treasure Hunter game and experience an amazing adventure full of dangers, treasures, and monsters!

Download now:  https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.DanielSzulc.TreasureHunter

More information can you find on the website: https://daniel-szulc.github.io/TreasureHunter
